Date: Thursday, 5/1/1985
Subject: Progress of Joseph Clyde
Dear Sir,
Joseph Clyde has an ERA of 1.85 at A Longmont Storm!
I believe he is ready for the next level!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Subject: Progress of Alva Fernandez

to promote him soon!

Regards,
Scouting Director

Dear Sir,

should demote him before he gets burned.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Saturday, 9/27/1985
Subject: My role in this team
Sir,

I would do an adequate job. Otherwise, I'd like to play
elsewhere!

Regards,
Eduardo Moreira
